title: Discover JetBrains Consulting Partner Services
description: At JetBrains, we are committed to empowering developers to do their best work with world-class tools. But even the best tools can deliver so much more when paired with expert guidance. That is why we’ve built a global network of Consulting Partners – professionals dedicated to helping you and your team maximize the value of […]
author: Elizaveta Chepurnaia
excerpt: Our Consulting Partners offer tailored solutions to help you succeed, from seamless deployment to hands-on training.
text: News At JetBrains, we are committed to empowering developers to do their best work with world-class tools. But even the best tools can deliver so much more when paired with expert guidance. That is why we’ve built a global network of Consulting Partners – professionals dedicated to helping you and your team maximize the value of JetBrains products. From seamless deployment to hands-on training, our Consulting Partners offer tailored solutions to help you succeed. Whether you’re just starting with JetBrains or looking to improve your existing setup, they are here to make every step easy and impactful. What makes consulting partners so valuable? JetBrains Consulting Partners are experts in the tools you rely on. Whether it is personalized training, tailored deployment strategies, or ongoing support, these partners have the technical knowledge and practical experience to ensure your team thrives. With their help, you can: Get personalized solutions designed around your team’s unique workflows. Streamline deployment of tools like YouTrack and TeamCity, saving time and resources. Provide your team with expert training to help them tackle challenges effectively. Take, for example, Twenty20 GmbH & Co. KG, one of our consulting partners specializing in YouTrack and TeamCity. They’ve developed innovative solutions like the Diagrams app, which enhances YouTrack’s functionality and helps teams visualize data more effectively.  Consulting partners can help optimize JetBrains tools to meet your business’s unique needs, like transitioning from an outdated platform to YouTrack, customizing configurations to fit your team’s processes and objectives. Partner spotlight Our partners are not just service providers, they are innovators, building on JetBrains tools to create real value for customers. Our partner shared: “We’re excited about our growing partnership with JetBrains, which has already proven valuable and offers great potential for the future. Being active developers ourselves, we create solutions that enrich tools like YouTrack, helping teams work smarter and more efficiently. The feedback from our customers has been overwhelmingly positive, confirming the real impact of these enhancements.”  Stephan Weck, Twenty20 GmbH & Co. KG Another partner highlighted how JetBrains tools have helped attract customers seeking alternatives to other platforms: “ We have been able to continuously increase licence sales of JetBrains products each year. In addition, we have hosting customers who have successfully switched from Atlassian to YouTrack.” Lea Bröckers, Pix Software GmbH Benefits for businesses partnering with JetBrains Joining our Consulting Partner Program offers plenty of opportunities for your business: Access exclusive training, certifications, and resources to deepen your JetBrains expertise. Gain exposure to a global audience through a dedicated listing on our website. Partner with JetBrains for pre-sales support and collaborative demos. Earn a Certified designation, showcasing your credibility to potential clients. Our partners have shared positive experiences about the collaboration.  “We like the open and honest way of communicating with our contacts. We feel that we are in very good hands and know that JetBrains supports us very well with questions and challenges. We also really appreciate the fast response time!” Lea Bröckers, Pix Software GmbH Ready to elevate your JetBrains experience? If you are a developer or organization looking to optimize your use of JetBrains tools, our consulting partners are here to help. Explore our Consulting Partners page to find the expertise you need. Or, if you are a consulting company and want to join our network, learn more about the benefits and opportunities of becoming a JetBrains partner here. Subscribe to JetBrains Blog updates Discover more
html:
News

At JetBrains, we are committed to empowering developers to do their best work with world-class tools. But even the best tools can deliver so much more when paired with expert guidance. That is why we’ve built a global network of Consulting Partners – professionals dedicated to helping you and your team maximize the value of JetBrains products.

From seamless deployment to hands-on training, our Consulting Partners offer tailored solutions to help you succeed. Whether you’re just starting with JetBrains or looking to improve your existing setup, they are here to make every step easy and impactful.

What makes consulting partners so valuable?

JetBrains Consulting Partners are experts in the tools you rely on. Whether it is personalized training, tailored deployment strategies, or ongoing support, these partners have the technical knowledge and practical experience to ensure your team thrives. With their help, you can:

  • Get personalized solutions designed around your team’s unique workflows.
  • Streamline deployment of tools like YouTrack and TeamCity, saving time and resources.
  • Provide your team with expert training to help them tackle challenges effectively.

Take, for example, Twenty20 GmbH & Co. KG, one of our consulting partners specializing in YouTrack and TeamCity. They’ve developed innovative solutions like the Diagrams app, which enhances YouTrack’s functionality and helps teams visualize data more effectively. 

Consulting partners can help optimize JetBrains tools to meet your business’s unique needs, like transitioning from an outdated platform to YouTrack, customizing configurations to fit your team’s processes and objectives.

Partner spotlight

Our partners are not just service providers, they are innovators, building on JetBrains tools to create real value for customers. Our partner shared:

“We’re excited about our growing partnership with JetBrains, which has already proven valuable and offers great potential for the future. Being active developers ourselves, we create solutions that enrich tools like YouTrack, helping teams work smarter and more efficiently. The feedback from our customers has been overwhelmingly positive, confirming the real impact of these enhancements.” 

Stephan Weck, Twenty20 GmbH & Co. KG

Another partner highlighted how JetBrains tools have helped attract customers seeking alternatives to other platforms:

“ We have been able to continuously increase licence sales of JetBrains products each year. In addition, we have hosting customers who have successfully switched from Atlassian to YouTrack.”

Lea Bröckers, Pix Software GmbH

Benefits for businesses partnering with JetBrains

Joining our Consulting Partner Program offers plenty of opportunities for your business:

  • Access exclusive training, certifications, and resources to deepen your JetBrains expertise.
  • Gain exposure to a global audience through a dedicated listing on our website.
  • Partner with JetBrains for pre-sales support and collaborative demos.
  • Earn a Certified designation, showcasing your credibility to potential clients.

Our partners have shared positive experiences about the collaboration. 

“We like the open and honest way of communicating with our contacts. We feel that we are in very good hands and know that JetBrains supports us very well with questions and challenges. We also really appreciate the fast response time!”

Lea Bröckers, Pix Software GmbH

Ready to elevate your JetBrains experience?

If you are a developer or organization looking to optimize your use of JetBrains tools, our consulting partners are here to help. Explore our Consulting Partners page to find the expertise you need.

Or, if you are a consulting company and want to join our network, learn more about the benefits and opportunities of becoming a JetBrains partner here.

Subscribe to JetBrains Blog updates

Discover more
